name: Dominoes3D Simulator
description:
This game is a work in progress fun dominoes simulator. Do you remember how fun it was to knock them over?! No real dominoes required :P
You can place your dominoes on the board, watch them fall and do it over and over! There are save and load options for those who want to keep their creations and show them off or edit them later to add more!

Domino deletion real-time will be added in the future!
There are 8 save slots available that can also be overwritten if you want to improve a current design!


Feel free to report any errors and fixes needed. Don't forget to review!
Enjoy!

-UPCOMING UPDATES:
*better physics on gravity and collision
*Starting Domino Rotation during editing
*Graphical changes
*Spawn collision changes for no colliding on drag
*added objects
*color dominoe abilities
*Removing placement limitations on objects (no more "X"s!)
*recoded drag and drop, less buggy
*more...!


Check out the game devlog on the menu page of the game. Mar 5, 2022 1.1 RELEASE Completely new graphics and added content!
